title: Is Angular a JavaScript library? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer is NO. Angular is a javaScript frontend framework which is used to design the frontend of web applications. It is a very popular framework and not a library of javaScript. Angular is used in very famous websites like- GitHub Community Forum Microsoft Office Home VMware Clarity Design System Forbes Google Marketing Platform Google Digital Garage Samsung Forward and many more….. So I hope that now you are clear that Angular is not library but it is a framework. Have a nice day.
